entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 06:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
